languages.text: "Нет, она умерла! Ее больше нет! Заткнитесь!" {n}Идира запускает пальцы во всклокоченные волосы.{/n} "Простите, шепоткам вдруг захотелось по больному проехаться. А? Я что-то пропустила?"
"No, she is dead! She is gone! Shut up!" {n}Idira runs her fingers through her dishevelled hair.{/n} "Sorry. My little whispers suddenly hit a sore spot. Huh? Did I miss something?"
languages.original_text: "Нет, она умерла! Ее больше нет! Заткнитесь!" {n}Идира запускает пальцы во всклокоченные волосы.{/n} "Простите, шепоткам вдруг захотелось по больному проехаться. А? Я что-то пропустила?"

traits.locale_text: "No, she is dead! She is gone! Shut up!" {n}Idira runs fingers through her disheveled hair.{/n} "Sorry, the little whispers suddenly hit a sore spot. Huh? Did I miss something?"

"No, she is dead! She is gone! Shut up!" {n}Idira runs her fingers through her dishevelled hair.{/n} "Sorry. My little whispers suddenly hit a sore spot. Huh? Did I miss something?"

languages.text: «¡No, está muerta! ¡Ya no está! ¡Callaos!». {n}Idira se pasa los dedos por su cabello desgreñado.{/n} «Perdón. Mis pequeños susurros me han dado donde duele. ¿Eh? ¿Me he perdido algo?».
languages.original_text: "No, she is dead! She is gone! Shut up!" {n}Idira runs her fingers through her dishevelled hair.{/n} "Sorry. My little whispers suddenly hit a sore spot. Huh? Did I miss something?"

traits.locale_text: «¡No, está muerta! ¡Ya no está! ¡Callaos!». {n}Idira se pasa los dedos por su cabello desgreñado.{/n} «Perdón. Mis pequeños susurros me han dado donde duele. ¿Eh? ¿Me he perdido algo?».

languages.text: “不，她死了！她已经死了！给我闭嘴！”{n}伊迪拉用手指梳理着蓬乱的头发。{/n}“抱歉，刚刚那些低语简直是哪壶不开提哪壶。嗯？我是错过什么了吗？”
languages.original_text: "No, she is dead! She is gone! Shut up!" {n}Idira runs her fingers through her dishevelled hair.{/n} "Sorry. My little whispers suddenly hit a sore spot. Huh? Did I miss something?"

traits.locale_text: “不，她死了！她已经死了！给我闭嘴！”{n}伊迪拉用手指梳理着蓬乱的头发。{/n}“抱歉，刚刚那些低语简直是哪壶不开提哪壶。嗯？我是错过什么了吗？”

languages.text: 「いいえ、彼女は死んだ！死んじまった！うるさい！」{n}イディラは乱れた髪に指を走らせる。{/n}「ごめんなさい。あたいの囁き声が痛いところをついたかい？違うかい？」
languages.original_text: "No, she is dead! She is gone! Shut up!" {n}Idira runs her fingers through her dishevelled hair.{/n} "Sorry. My little whispers suddenly hit a sore spot. Huh? Did I miss something?"

traits.locale_text: 「いいえ、彼女は死んだ！死んじまった！うるさい！」{n}イディラは乱れた髪に指を走らせる。{/n}「ごめんなさい。あたいの囁き声が痛いところをついたかい？違うかい？」

languages.text: « Non, elle est morte ! Elle ne reviendra pas ! Bouclez-la ! » {n}Idira passe ses doigts dans ses cheveux ébouriffés.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi. Mes petits murmures ont touché une corde sensible. Ahem... J'ai loupé quelque chose ? »
languages.original_text: "No, she is dead! She is gone! Shut up!" {n}Idira runs her fingers through her dishevelled hair.{/n} "Sorry. My little whispers suddenly hit a sore spot. Huh? Did I miss something?"

traits.locale_text: « Non, elle est morte ! Elle ne reviendra pas ! Bouclez-la ! » {n}Idira passe ses doigts dans ses cheveux ébouriffés.{/n} « Pardonnez-moi. Mes petits murmures ont touché une corde sensible. Ahem... J'ai loupé quelque chose ? »

languages.text: "Hayır! O öldü! Artık yok! Susun!" {n}İdira, darmadağın saçlarına parmaklarını geçiriyor.{/n} "Affedersin. Fısıltılarım bir anda hassas bir konudan laf açtı. Ne oldu? Bir şey mi kaçırdım?"
languages.original_text: "No, she is dead! She is gone! Shut up!" {n}Idira runs her fingers through her dishevelled hair.{/n} "Sorry. My little whispers suddenly hit a sore spot. Huh? Did I miss something?"

traits.locale_text: "Hayır! O öldü! Artık yok! Susun!" {n}İdira, darmadağın saçlarına parmaklarını geçiriyor.{/n} "Affedersin. Fısıltılarım bir anda hassas bir konudan laf açtı. Ne oldu? Bir şey mi kaçırdım?"

languages.text: "Nein, sie ist tot! Sie ist fort. Seid still!" {n}Idira fährt sich mit den Fingern durch ihr zerzaustes Haar.{/n} "Tut mir leid. Meine kleinen Flüsterstimmen haben einen wunden Punkt getroffen. Huh? Habe ich etwas verpasst?"
languages.original_text: "No, she is dead! She is gone! Shut up!" {n}Idira runs her fingers through her dishevelled hair.{/n} "Sorry. My little whispers suddenly hit a sore spot. Huh? Did I miss something?"
